bibl.title: Thermae et Balnea. The Architecture and Cultural History of Roman Public Baths. I. Text; - II. Catalogue and Plates.
bibl.note: See Catalogue, p. 35: Aegyptus, C. 279-285 (Abu Mena, Alexandria, Cheikh Zouede, Karanis, Kôm el-Ahmar, Kôm el-Dosheh, Kôm Trougah).
NIELSEN Inge, Thermae et Balnea. The Architecture and Cultural History of Roman Public Baths. I. Text; - II. Catalogue and Plates.
Aarhus, University Press, 1990, 4°, [viii]-194 pp.; - [vi]-212 pp., 260 figg.
